Name: Scorpio Turret
Description: Gain the ability to deploy a Scorpio Turret that automatically fires at enemies. The Scorpio Turret also has shields that can be used as cover.

Name: Impact
Description: Increases Bullet Damage with all weapon types.

Name: Sentry
Description: Increases Scorpio Turret damage.

Name: Defense
Description: Increases how quickly your shields recharge.

Name: Stockpile
Description: Players near the Scorpio Turret regenerate ammo for the weapon currently in their hands.

Name: Fitness
Description: Increases your Maximum Health.

Name: Aid Station
Description: Allies near the Scorpio Turret regenerate health.

Name: Scattershot
Description: Increases shotgun damage and spread.

Name: Metal Storm
Description: Killing an enemy increases your Fire Rate and reduces Recoil for a few seconds.

Name: Quick Charge
Description: Killing an enemy causes your shields to quickly regenerate for a few seconds.

Name: Barrage
Description: Increases the number of shots your Scorpio Turret fires in each burst.

Name: Overload
Description: Increases magazine capacity with all weapon types.

Name: Cauterize
Description: Shooting team members heals them. This effect also works with grenades and rockets.

Name: Refire
Description: Shooting an enemy reduces the Cooldown of your Scorpio Turret. This effect can only occur every 2 seconds.
Improvement: Cooldown reduction per hit: X (in seconds)

Name: Assault
Description: Increases Magazine Size and reduces Recoil with Combat Rifles.

Name: Grenadier
Description: Killing an enemy increases your grenade damage and causes you to regenerate grenades for a few seconds.

Name: Deploy
Description: Reduces the cooldown for your Scorpio Turret.

Name: Revive
Description: The Scorpio Turret has a chance to instantly revive nearby crippled friends when deployed.

Name: Grit
Description: Increases your resistance to Bullet Damage.

Name: Guided Missile
Description: Your Scorpio Turret launches guided missiles in addition to using its regular gun.
Improvement: Fire a missile every X seconds

Name: Supply Drop
Description: The Scorpio Turret periodically fires out supply pickups to resupply players.

Name: Stat
Description: Killing an enemy increases health regeneration for you and nearby friends for a few seconds.

Name: Bloodwing
Description: Gain the ability to send your pet Bloodwing out to attack an enemy and then return.

Name: Focus
Description: Increases accuracy with all weapon types.

Name: Caliber
Description: Increases damage with Sniper Rifles.

Name: Swift Strike
Description: Increases Bloodwing Damage and movement speed.

Name: Swipe
Description: The Bloodwing causes enemies to drop additional money, ammo, and healing items when it attacks.
Improvement: Maximum number of additional items dropped: X

Name: Deadly
Description: Increases Critical Hit damage.

Name: Gun Crazy
Description: When using pistols, you have a chance to fire two shots with each pull of the trigger instead of just one.

Name: Smirk
Description: All players on your team (including you) gain additional experience when you kill an enemy with a Critical Hit.

Name: Killer
Description: Killing an enemy increases your Damage and Reload Speed with all guns for a few seconds.

Name: Fast Hands
Description: Increases Reload Speed with all weapon types.

Name: Out For Blood
Description: When your Bloodwing strikes an enemy, you gain health based on the amount of damage done.

Name: Lethal Strike
Description: Increases melee damage. Also, every melee attack has a 35% chance to be a Lethal Strike and deal extremely high damage.

Name: Riotous Remedy
Description: Killing an enemy gives you chaotic health regeneration for a few seconds.
Improvement: Healed up to X% of your maximum Health over 7 seconds

Name: Loaded
Description: Increases Magazine Capacity with Sniper Rifles.

Name: Carrion Call
Description: Shooting an enemy with a Sniper Rifle reduces the cooldown of your Bloodwing.

Name: Aerial Impact
Description: Attacks from your Bloodwing can Daze enemies, reducing their movement speed and accuracy.
Improvement: X% Chance to Daze (vs an equal level enemy)

Name: Ransack
Description: Killing an enemy increases the amount of loot you get from other enemies killed for a few seconds.
Improvement: X% Chance to drop an additional item

Name: Predator
Description: Decreases the cooldown of your pet Bloodwing.
Improvement: Bloodwing Cooldown reduced by X seconds

Name: Hair Trigger
Description: Increases Fire Rate and Magazine Size with pistols.

Name: Trespass
Description: Your bullets have a chance to ignore enemy shields. Also, slightly increases Bullet Damage.
Improvement: X% chance to penetrate shields/+X% Bullet Damage

Name: Bird of Prey
Description: Increases the number of targets the Bloodwing can attack before returning.
Improvement: Bloodwing attacks up to X targets

Name: Relentless
Description: Killing an enemy increases your fire rate and gives every bullet fired a 25% chance to be a Killer Shot and deal additional damage. This effect lasts a few seconds..

Name: Phasewalk
Description: Gain the ability to turn invisible and move incredibly fast. Upon entering and leaving Phasewalk, you create a Phase Blast that damages nearby enemies. You can Melee attack to end Phasewalk early.

Name: Diva
Description: Increases the capacity of your shield.

Name: Striking
Description: Your melee attacks can Daze enemies, reducing their movement speed and accuracy.
Improvement: +X% Chance to Daze (vs an equal level enemy)

Name: Quicksilver
Description: Increases your Fire Rate with all weapons.

Name: Spark
Description: Causing Elemental Effects with Elemental Weapons.

Name: Slayer
Description: Increases your Critical Hit Damage.

Name: Silent Resolve
Description: Increases your resistance to damage for a few seconds after Phasewalking.

Name: Inner Glow
Description: You regenerate Health while Phasewalking.
Improvement: Regenerate +X% of your Health per second while Phasewalking

Name: Dramatic Entrance
Description: Your Phase Blast can Daze enemies, reducing their movement speed and accuracy.
Improvement: +X% Chance to Daze (vs an equal level enemy)

Name: Resilience
Description: Increases your resistance to Fire, Shock, Corrosive, and Explosive Damage.

Name: Radiance
Description: You deal Shock Damage to nearby enemies while Phasewalking. Damage is based on your Level and the Skill's Level.

Name: Enforcer
Description: Killing an enemy increases your accuracy and Bullet Damage for a few seconds.

Name: Hit & Run
Description: Gain increased melee damage and Phasewalk duration.

Name: Hard to Get
Description: Decreases the Cooldown time of Phasewalk.
Improvement: Phasewalk Cooldown reduced by X seconds

Name: Girl Power
Description: Killing an enemy causes your Shield to quickly regenerate for a few seconds.
Improvement: Regenerates X% of your Shield per second

Name: Venom
Description: Add Corrosive Damage to your melee attacks. Also, your melee atacks have a chance to Corrode enemies, causing additional damage over time.

Name: Intuition
Description: Killing an enemy increases your movement speed and the experience you and your team earn for a few seconds.

Name: High Velocity
Description: Increases Bullet Damage and Velocity.

Name: Blackout
Description: Killing an enemy reduces the cooldown time of Phasewalk.
Improvement: X seconds of cooldown reduction per kill

Name: Mind Games
Description: Each bullet has a chance to Daze enemies, reducing their movement speed and accuracy.
Improvement: +X% Chance to Daze (vs an equal level enemy)

Name: Phoenix
Description: Killing an enemy causes you to deal Fire Damage to nearby enemies and makes your shots not always cost ammo for a few seconds. Fire Damage increases with your Level.
Improvement: +X% Chance to save ammo/+X Fire Damage

Name: Phase Strike
Description: Using a melee attack while Phasewalking deals additional damage.

Name: Berserk
Description: Gain the ability to go Berserk. While in this state, use the Aim and Fire Buttons to throw punches. Also, you gain resistance to all damage and you regenerate health while Berserking.

Name: Iron Fist
Description: Increases the melee damage you deal.

Name: Endless Rage
Description: Increases the duration of Berserk.

Name: Hardened
Description: Increases your maximum health.

Name: Safeguard
Description: Increases the strength of your shield.

Name: Endowed
Description: Increases the Explosive Damage you deal.

Name: Rapid Reload
Description: Increases your Reload Speed and reduces Recoil with all weapons.

Name: Sting Like a Bee
Description: Punching while Berserk causes you to dash forward and slug your enemies.

Name: Heavy Handed
Description: Killing an enemy greatly increases your melee damage for a few seconds.

Name: Bash
Description: Gives your melee attacks a chance to Daze enemies, slowing them and reducing their accuracy.

Name: Juggernaut
Description: Killing an enemy creates resistance to all damage for a few seconds.

Name: Revenge
Description: Killing an enemy increases your damage with all weapons for a few seconds.

Name: Wide Load
Description: Increases the number of Rockets your Rocket Launcher can hold in its magazine.

Name: Prize Fighter
Description: While Berserk is active, your melee attacks have a chance to spawn cash prizes.
Improvement: X% chance to spawn a cash prize

Name: Short Fuse
Description: Decreases the Cooldown of Berserk.
Improvement: Berserk Cooldown reduced by X seconds

Name: Pay Back
Description: After your shields become depleted, you gain a damage bonus for 10 seconds.

Name: Diehard
Description: Increases the amount of health you regain when revived by a friend or by Second Wind. Also, increases the amount of time you have before you die while you are Crippled.
Improvement: +X% Revived Health Bonus/+X% Time to be Revived

Name: Liquidate
Description: Dealing Explosive Damage to an enemy reduces the Cooldown time of Berserk.
Improvement: Cooldown reduction per hit: X (in seconds)

Name: Cast Iron
Description: Increases your resistance to Explosive Damage.

Name: Blood Sport
Description: Killing an enemy while Berserk is active regenerates some of your health.

Name: Unbreakable
Description: When your shield is depleted, you gain 5 seconds of powerful shield regeneration.

Name: Master Blaster
Description: Killing an enemy increases your Fire Rate with all weapons and causes you to regenerate rockets for a few seconds.
Improvement: +X% Fire Rate/X Rockets regenerated per minute
